description: For authentic Thai-inspired flavours, go for Mama's range of instant noodles. The jumbo 90g packets offer a quick and convenient way to get your favourite Thai noodle dishes on your dinner table.
name: Tom Yum Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 180 g Mama Shrimp (Tom Yum) Flavour instant noodles

recipeInstructions.text: Divide noodle mixture among bowls. Serve topped with onion, shallots, coriander and remaining chilli.
Divide noodle mixture among bowls. Serve topped with onion, shallots, coriander and remaining chilli.
